plot: After seeing Leia kiss Luke on his VHS copy of "Empire Strikes Back," a young boy develops an inappropriate crush of his own.
title: The First Hope
plot_es: After seeing Leia kiss Luke on his VHS copy of "Empire Strikes Back," a young boy develops an inappropriate crush of his own.
